Package utilities

Class AttributeString<T>

java.lang.Object
utilities.AttributeString<T>
Type Parameters:
T - whatever the type of the value needs to be
public class AttributeString<T>
extends java.lang.Object
This is a utilty class which can be used to show a value with a name for it bit easier than trying to include methods to completely rewrite every individual string whenever the value associated with that string is updated by any amount, y'know?

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.lang.String attributeName
    the words before the value
    private java.lang.String suffix
    the words after the value
    private java.lang.String theString
    basically the attributeName, the value, and the suffix put together in one string
    private T value
    the generic value held by this object

  • Constructor Details

    • AttributeString

      public AttributeString​(java.lang.String attributeName, T value, java.lang.String suffix)
      Sets the attributeName, value, and suffix, updating the text of this respectively
      Parameters:
      attributeName - what the attributeName will be. String. Use an empty string if you don't want one
      value - Whatever the value being held by this AttributeString will be
      suffix - A suffix for this AttributeString. Use an empty string if you don't want one

    • AttributeString

      public AttributeString​(java.lang.String attributeName, T value)
      Sets the attributeName and the value of the AttributeString accordingly. Suffix will be blank. if you just want a value and a suffix, use the 3-argument constructor, with a blank string for attributeName (less messy that way)
      Parameters:
      attributeName - the prefix
      value - whatever the value is meant to be

    • AttributeString

      public AttributeString​(T value)
      Sets the value for the attributeString. attributeName and suffix will be empty strings
      Parameters:
      value - the value you want this attributeString to store

  • Method Details

    • showValue

      public java.lang.String showValue​(T value)
      Sets a specified value for this attributeString
      Parameters:
      value - new value to show
      Returns:
      the string representation of this AttributeString

    • rename

      public java.lang.String rename​(java.lang.String attributeName)
      Renames the attributeName of this AttributeString
      Parameters:
      attributeName - what name you want to use
      Returns:
      the toString representation of this AttributeString

    • changeSuffix

      public java.lang.String changeSuffix​(java.lang.String newSuffix)
      Renames the suffix of this AttributeString
      Parameters:
      newSuffix - the new suffix you want to use
      Returns:
      the toString representation of this AttributeString

    • updateText

      private java.lang.String updateText()
      basically updates the string representation of this AttributeString and returns it
      Returns:
      new string representation of this AttributeString

    • getValue

      public T getValue()
      returns the value of this AttributeString
      Returns:

    • getSuffix

      Returns:
